portfolio.title: Course Management App
portfolio.description: A Course Management App is a web-based platform designed to manage course content, student enrollment, and course schedules for educational institutions. The app allows instructors to create and organize course content, manage assignments, and track student progress. Students can access course materials, submit assignments, and communicate with instructors through the app.

portfolio.title: Streaming Service App
portfolio.description: A Streaming Service App is a web-based platform designed to provide users with access to streaming media content. The app offers a wide range of movies, TV shows, music, and other media content that can be streamed online. Users can create playlists, save favorite media content, and customize their viewing preferences.

portfolio.title: Corporate Management App
portfolio.description: A Corporate Management App is a web-based platform designed to manage and organize corporate data, resources, and workflows. The app offers a range of features, including human resource management, project management, and financial management. The app provides real-time insights into company performance, enabling better decision-making and improved productivity.

portfolio.title: Distribution System
portfolio.description: A Distribution System is a web-based platform designed to manage the distribution of goods or services. The system automates processes such as order management, inventory tracking, and shipping logistics. It offers real-time visibility into inventory levels and shipping statuses, allowing companies to optimize distribution operations and minimize costs.

portfolio.title: Affiliation Management System
portfolio.description: A software application designed to manage the affiliation process for an organization, such as tracking affiliate registrations, managing commissions, and providing reporting tools.

portfolio.title: Leasing Management system
portfolio.description: A software application designed to help manage the leasing process for rental properties, such as tracking lease agreements, rent payments, maintenance requests, and tenant information.

portfolio.title: Attendance Management system
portfolio.description: The Attendance Management system is a web-based platform designed to help businesses and educational institutions keep track of attendance records. It simplifies the process of taking attendance, generating reports, and analyzing attendance data. The system enables teachers or administrators to quickly take attendance and identify trends, such as patterns of absences, tardiness, or early departures.

portfolio.title: Exam system
portfolio.description: This web project is an exam management system designed to streamline the process of creating, administering, and grading exams. The system is designed to be used by educators, administrators, and students, and offers a range of features to simplify exam management.

portfolio.title: Point of Sale
portfolio.description: This web project is a Point of Sale (POS) system designed to simplify and streamline the sales process for businesses. The system offers a range of features to help businesses manage sales, inventory, and customer information. With this system, businesses can process sales transactions quickly and easily, with support for various payment options, including credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payments.

portfolio.title: Ecommerce Sites
portfolio.description: This web project is an ecommerce site designed to provide customers with a seamless online shopping experience. It allows customers to browse and purchase products in various categories, including electronics, fashion, home and garden, and more. The site also offers secure payment options, order tracking, and customer support to ensure a hassle-free shopping experience.

testimonial.name: Jawad Sheikh
testimonial.testimoni: As a small business owner, I don't have the time or resources to manage my own IT needs. That's why I turned to this IT company, and I'm so glad I did. They've helped me streamline my technology and improve my efficiency, which has saved me both time and money.

testimonial.name: President LTBA
testimonial.testimoni: Our company has been working with this IT company for over a year now, and we couldn't be happier with their services. Their team is knowledgeable, responsive, and always goes above and beyond to ensure our technology is running smoothly.

testimonial.name: Hamna Kamran
testimonial.testimoni: Working with this IT company has been a game-changer for our business. They've helped us implement new technology that has improved our productivity, and they've provided us with ongoing support and maintenance that has given us peace of mind. We can't recommend them enough!

testimonial.name: Basit Goraya
testimonial.testimoni: This IT company has been a true partner to our business. They're always available when we need them, and their solutions are tailored to our specific needs. We trust them completely to manage our technology, and they've never let us down.

testimonial.name: Usman Nadeem
testimonial.testimoni: We hired this IT company to help us with a major software migration, and they exceeded our expectations. Their team was able to seamlessly transition us to the new system without any major disruptions to our business. We're grateful for their expertise and support.
